Learn More About What Makes Us Better

Presenting TrulyProtect's Patented TPVisor Trusted Platform


  • The TPVisor Is a Thin Hypervisor deployed On A Given Computing Platform

  • The TPVisor Creates Secure Memory Regions And Registers Within Your Hardware Inaccessible To The Running OS And Any Malware Or Hacker Possibly Attacking The Machine

  • Our Range Of Products Use This Capability To Create Encrypted Memory Regions And Applications Which Are Impenetrable To Any Hacker

  • In Addition Our TPVisor Can Act As A System Supervisor And Whitelist Or Blacklist Unauthorized Code To Prevent Even The Possibility Of Any Malware

Utilize TrulyProtect's Core Technology And Protect Your Business Assets

By Employing Our Top Cyber Solutions

Anti-Reverse Engineering

TrulyProtect's patented solution is the only product in the market which employs pure encryption while protecting your most precious intellectual property. Using our patented solutions you can protect your application from IP theft, verift the app authentication and have it run as intended.

Realtime Data Protection

TrulyProtect's SecureData ensures your applications data is safe and secure, our product can seperate your applications memory buffers from the rest of the computer thus promising all unauthorised 3rd party applications cannot access it and steal your information.

Application "Firewall"

Borrowing from the firewall concept, our Application Firewall prohibits the execution of any unauthorised piece of code thus it guards your production servers, endpoints and critical machines even from the possibility of the executing any malicous software.
